description: I contacted an agency to get a model for a masked underwear shoot. What started as a normal photo shoot ended in a naked video session. This model, Matt, was so hot, I could see he had a lot more to offer. For sure, one of my favorite cocks to date. Simply perfect in my opinion. Good hard-on, amazing body...I'm really excited about this week's addition. Hope you'll like him too!
title: Matt's Photoshoot, Scene #01
